name: Tribal Electrification Program
objective: Tribal Electrification Program through the Inflation Reduction Act to provide zero emission household electrification to tribes and on tribal lands.
applicant_types: Native American Organizations (includes Indian groups, cooperatives, corporations, partnerships, associations)

results.description: This is a new program. Projects will be funded that meet the requirements of the legislation

authorizations.text: Pub. L. 117-169, SEC. 80003. Tribal Electrification Program.
